product_name: Darn Tough Light Hiker Quarter Socks - Women's
long_description: With high-density cushioning, reinforced areas and snug-fitting ribbing at the ankles, Darn Tough Light Hiker Quarter women's socks provide miles and miles of durability and comfort for your feet. Darn Tough uses a custom-count, shrink-treated merino wool that enhances comfort and durability for outdoor activities. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Ring-toe construction hides seams and enhances comfort. Reinforced heels and toes; elastic support around the arches. Darn Tough recommends that you machine wash socks inside out in warm water on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: With high-density cushioning, reinforced areas and snug-fitting ribbing at the ankles, Darn Tough Light Hiker Quarter women's socks provide miles and miles of durability and comfort for your feet.
